subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United took the Premier League lead at the end of a round of games for the first time since Oct. 15, beating West Bromwich Albion, 2-0, while Manchester City lost at Swansea, 1-0.
snippet: Manchester United took the Premier League lead at the end of a round of games for the first time since Oct. 15, beating West Bromwich Albion, 2-0, while Manchester City lost at Swansea, 1-0.
